translations.text: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh<sup foot_note=197820>1</sup> -
Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer<sup foot_note=197821>1</sup> -
Let them worship the Lord of this House,<sup foot_note=197822>1</sup>
Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.
